description: Hiked to summit above Loquilts Lake and down to a camp at the lake - 10hrs. Returned the next day in 3 or 4 hrs. Enjoyed panoramic views, crisp mountain air and huge - majestic - rock formations.
directions: Boat or fly in to Chatter Box Falls. We sailed up Sechelt Inlet and stayed overnight (on the boat) at Egmont. We then sailed to Chatter Box Falls and stayed overnight. We hiked up in the morning and we were back before lunch the next day. We sailed out that afternoon.
title: Princess Louisa Inlet to Summit Above Loquilts Lake
